amendment.description: Amendment sought to allow eight States to coordinate Head Start with state-run early childhood development programs through a demonstration program.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 2 printed in House Report 110-116 to allow eight states to coordinate Head Start with state-run early childhood development programs through a demonstration program.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Price (GA) amendment (A002) Failed by recorded vote: 165 - 254 (Roll no. 277).
